name: Microwave oven
description:
21L : Suitable for families with 3 to 4 members

name: Telvision
description:

Mi Air Purifier

name: Vaccum Cleaner

name: Table
description:
Made of pine wood and mdf colored board it is best suitable for study, laptop table,and laptop riser
Finely designed and crafted with a natural finish. It is durable and practical. You can use it as a laptop table, reading desk, breakfast tray or a working desk. Its convenient for using in bed, on the floor, sofa, recliner, car and many other circumstances
Equipped with adjustable legs allowing you to set it at the perfect height.
Drawer on side to keep CD etc
Package Content - 1 Laptop Table

name: Chair
description:

name: Almirah
description:
Made from selected cloth cover, high quality steel tube and PP Plastic Connectors, this portable storage closet will meet your long term storage needs.
Beautifully designed and innovatively crafted modern design. With Movable clothes hanging rod and 8 storage shelves offers you enough space both for your longer outfits and folded clothes
Made from strong and durable material. Powder-coated surface. Portable & light weight easy to carry and put any where.
Durable, Portable, Sophisticated and Stylish Design. For those who love organized living.
Great size of 130 x 45 x 175 which makes it suitable for organizing your small rooms and walk-in closet
